319820.name: Awesomenauts - Leon Legionnaire Skin
319820.description:
My name is Leon Legionnaire, commander of the Armies of Aiguillon, connoisseur of fine cheese and loyal servant to the TRUE emperor: Blabus Zorkonius. Owner of a stolen space yacht, winner of the 3586 jeu de boules cup. I will claim my glory, in this battle or the next.

This DLC contains a custom skin for Leon Chameleon in Awesomenauts. You need to have Leon Chameleon available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.

Leon Legionnaire was designed by community member Lautaro Aglione for the Design-a-skin competition and was chosen by the community as one the runner-ups to Grim Genji from more than 250 submissions!
319820.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 已启用 Valve 反作弊保护
